feed.title: WXP
feed.subtitle: Write your site description here. It will be used as your sites meta description as well!

entry.title: The second day
entry.content: Today I started at eleven o'clock in the morning, I took the tram to downtown The Hague and walked to the shop. When I arrived at the store, I put my bag and jacket upstairs away in the canteen, then I also met some new staff. The first thing I had to do was putting an IKEA lamp together, which did not take a long time. After that I had to get the new magazines and newspaper out of the packaging and stick the price onto them (translated from pounds to euros), some items that were reserved needed to be put aside and they had to be placed in the archive. My next assignment was to clear one of the display tables, collect certain 2018 calendars and place them in a way that the biggest piles would be in the middle. It was already getting late and I still didn't have a break , so I took a break and had lunch. To finish off the work I was asked to get new books out of the stacked boxes In the back of the store, scan the book into the computer, and stick the price card on it. After a few of these boxes, I could stop working and I was permitted to go home. I took the tram to our hotel, had something to eat and my mother then drove me to the beach to surf.
entry.summary: Today I started at eleven o'clock in the morning, I took the tram to downtown The Hague and walked to the shop. When I arrived at the store, I put my bag and jacket upstairs away in the canteen, then I also met some new staff. The first thing I had to do was putting an IKEA lamp together, which did not take a long time. After that I had to get the new magazines and newspaper out of the packaging and stick the price onto them (translated from pounds to euros), some items that were reserved needed to be put aside and they had to be placed in the archive. My next assignment was to clear one of the display tables, collect certain 2018 calendars and place them in a way that the biggest piles would be in the middle. It was already getting late and I still didn't have a break , so I took a break and had lunch. To finish off the work I was asked to get new books out of the stacked boxes In the back of the store, scan the book into the computer, and stick the price card on it. After a few of these boxes, I could stop working and I was permitted to go home. I took the tram to our hotel, had something to eat and my mother then drove me to the beach to surf.

entry.title: The first day
entry.content: began 1200, met my mentor and other temporary colleges, got a tour and could place my stuff in the canteen, had to make a map of the store, had to calculate discount prices and add these to the books(actually magazines), at around 1445 I had a 15 minute break and ate my lunch in the canteen, had to clear the magazine shelf and also put the new magazines or issues as they call them in place, then had to tidy up the shelfs on the 2nd floor area and place the books where they belonged.
entry.summary: began 1200, met my mentor and other temporary colleges, got a tour and could place my stuff in the canteen, had to make a map of the store, had to calculate discount prices and add these to the books(actually magazines), at around 1445 I had a 15 minute break and ate my lunch in the canteen, had to clear the magazine shelf and also put the new magazines or issues as they call them in place, then had to tidy up the shelfs on the 2nd floor area and place the books where they belonged.
